ClearableDigraphComponent< BAS > Class Template Reference

Detailed Description

template<typename BAS = BaseDigraphComponent>
class lemon::concepts::ClearableDigraphComponent< BAS >

This class describes the interface of clearable directed graphs. It extends BaseDigraphComponent with a function for clearing the digraph. This concept requires AlterableDigraphComponent.

#include <lemon/concepts/graph_components.h>
